commit message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:freezy/android-xbmcremote
added local.properties to gitignore
Pulled out parts of SQL to constants
Added imdbId to Movie. Made some fields final
Broke out intent processing to separate methods
Moved sections around to make Android happy (moved sections before application)
Made all fields set on construction (that should be constant) final
Fixed row offset with new IMDbId
Accessor for new imdb field
Added support for youtube id's with -'s
Finished IMDB playing. Has confirmation dialog. Properly threaded. Uses progress dialog when querying XBMC for movies
Fix specials text and thumbnail display
Centralize season/special text under getShortName()

Fix missed Season 0 in now playing.
Move download() code to the connection class and use userlaying connection to avoid 401 errors

Begin caching all covers after loading a list.
If in memcache, load immediatly, otherwise use the callback
Don't use softRef for covers (prevents GC of covers at the cost of more mem usage)
Update Thumbnail.screensize in every oncreate activity (fixes issues caused by rotating screen)
Purge memory cache when purging disk cache

Centre crop all thumbnails when saving to cache
Handle full screen AR properly in getTargetDimension
Remove redundant getDimension code
Fixed missing 'Special' text in the episode details screen
added .trim() to remove leading and trailing spaces from host address

enabled PlayFile() for media type 0 (needed to switch channels when
using XBMCs inbuilt tuxbox live TV stream client)

Fix performance issues
Sync load images from either disk cache or mem cache
Fix issue with default actor image background

Merge pull request #27 from natbur/master

Fixed issues with Specials in TV Seasons, display of thumbnail on now playing screen, Added pre-fetching of covers on lists.

Merge pull request #30 from Octoate/master

Leading or trailing spaces in host address during host configuration

Merge pull request #24 from cancan101/master

Added the ability to play movies from IMDB app using the Share feature.
Merge commit '1429cbac1335731cc940' into pull6

Screen off: stop polling for now playing info.

If the user wants 'Now playing' info to appear in their notification
area, make sure we don't poll XBMC every second while the screen is off,
as any new information cannot be seen until the screen is turned back on
anyway.
Test
Initial widget configutration
Fix stop button not working

clone graphics for widget to avoid orientation change to use landscape
graphics. Move the widget to its own package.
Error toast will be send at least after five seconds since last toast
Remove duplicate registration of MediaIntentActivity
Minor refaactoring

Merge branch 'android-widget'

Conflicts:
AndroidManifest.xml
Remove unnecessary test file

Added IMDb Integration
(Added IMDb feature to relevant context menus of Movies list, Movie
details, TV shows list, TV show details)
Added build files for ant and my own keystore file

Fixes for Frodo
Fixed tvshow queries so they appear in the app again
Added joins for all relevant queries to new art table so we can get the art url for banners, thumbs, etc
Use art url when calculating Crc to get cached thumbnail path

Create richer notifications using available APIs.

On Jelly Bean and above, create a BigPictureStyle notification, which expands to
show the thumbnail of the current episode. On Honeycomb and above, use that
thumbnail as the largeIcon. Notifications on devices below Honeycomb are
unchanged.

Fix unsafe concurrent accesses in NowPlayingPollerThread.

Also, clean up some messy indentation.
Update notification cover art more aggressively.
Scale cover art for large icon notifications.
Fixed not displaying actor thumb in video details
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/shaigithub/android-xbmcremote
Removed leftover line from conflict
Fixed query getting episode actors and thumbs
AndroidManifest for latest build

Added 'Queue Episode' and 'Play From Here' context items to tv episodes
Changed 'Play Episode' context item and button to clear playlist, add episode to playlist and start it so more episodes can then be queued

Added arturl to Artist class
Modified actor class to use arturl from parent artist
Modified tvshowclient and videoclient to get arturl before role
Modified music queries for Frodo
Fixed getting albums and artist lists if art url is null
Fixed play from here to loop through and episodes in list order incase file names not in the same order
Fixed getting Album cached thumbs
Fixed getting album/song thumbs for frodo
Fixed getting artist/song thumbs for frodo
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/tombriden/android-xbmcremote
Updated version number
fixed 'play now' button in episode details that i broke in last release
Fixed not clearing playlist properly when playing single episode
Added imdb context menu item to cast images in episode details
Added Queue Episode button to episode details
FileList view: made click and play context menu use the playlist so other things can be queued after

built out api for using jsonrpc
got getAlbums and sort working
checkpoint on getArtists
got a lot of the music display pieces working and some of the controller working

JSON RPC Clients
Mods to the connection and jsonrpc classes to get things working
Copied httpapi client classes across and changed all functions to use jsonrpc
GetActor functions not yet done as currently no way to get them using jsonrpc without getting full cast of every movie/show/episode and parsing from there

Various changes to get json rpc support working
Probably broken parts of http api functionality but its being deprecated and jsonrpc has existed in xbmc for a while so i don't care
Use jsonrpc to get now playing thumb
Forgot to hidewatched when selected
Fixed crash in now playing if thumb doesn't exist on server

Added code for getPlaylistSize in MusicClient
Added code for removeFromPlaylist when passing a filename in MusicClient
Fixed getting compilation artists
Fixed now playing music
Fixed playing a file of different type to current playing file (eg playing a video while music is currently on)
Fixed getting filelist of music/picture shares
Fixed playing folder from filelist
Don't bother with string hashmap in now playing stuff. no need for casting etc when can just use the jsonnode
Update version number
Handle potential null result in getArtists
Removed unused imports

Fixed NumberFormatException when locale on phone uses commas for decimal
catch potential null value in getting nowplaying thumb

Mods to get all thumbs using jsonrpc call to request url to download it from
Removed all leftover unused imports
Fixed now playing for movies
fixed most of the outstanding music player bugs

Merge remote-tracking branch 'shai/master'
Cleanup: API test run.

Changed function that gets string value from jsonnode by key to return comma seperated string if jsonnode is an array -fixes getting genres, cast etc on latest xbmc
Change get movies/tvshows by actor/genre functions to use filter property
Set ignorearticle to true in sorting of movies/tvshows
Fixed sorting by date added
Updated MusicClient to use filter param to get songs, artists, albums
Added 'Recent Episodes' option to TV shows sort menu to get recently added episodes

Added getRecentlyAddedEpisodes functions to ITvShowManager, ITvShowClient and implemented classes
Call getRecentlyAddedEpisodes directly in EpisodeListController if mSeasons is null
Fixed string compare when checking for blank url before trying to get cover that resulted in invalid params exception
Update version number
Fixed getting tvshow banners
Fixed info client using httpapi to get system info
Update version number

Merge pull request #80 from tombriden/notification_poller

Notification poller

Avoid NullPointerExceptions in empty sections

When a section is empty, the result list is omitted from the Json but
the Json result still contains a 'limits' element. Thus checking for
result.size() == 0 is not robust enough. So check for the actual list
element to exist.

Handle empty playlists correctly

Do not throw NullPointerExceptions and
IndexOutOfBoundExceptions when retrieving an empty
playlist.

Now playing: Handle duration == -1 in remaining time

Here unknown durations are given as -1, so handle that
when formatting the remaining time.

Merge pull request #90 from frankosterfeld/work/no-duration

Now playing: Handle duration == -1 in remaining time

Merge pull request #89 from frankosterfeld/work/fix-empty-list-npe

Work/fix empty lists/sections

Fix building with ant

Also add the lib-src directory to the sources to compile.
Make widget vertically resizable + add a small version
Allow widget to be used on the lock screen
Add widget preview image

Fixed remote bug (screen rotate = no keyup event)

The button_up event was not being sent to XBMC after a screen rotate.
Also, the timer for setting_send_repeats mode was not canceled after a
screen rotate, causing it to run indefinitely. Fixed by remembering the
current button being pressed, cleaning up the KeyPressTask, and sending
button_up events where appropriate.

Fixed 'play on xbmc' from youtube app

Sharing videos from youtube app to xbmcremote stopped working because
Intent.EXTRA_TEXT contained more than just the url and the url itself
changed to a short version (youtu.be/videoID)

Updated pattern with improved version

Found a better regex working regardless of the existence of protocol or 'www' in the url and being more robust and readable in general. This regex also returns only one capturing group containing only the thing we are looking for, the video ID.
Tests: http://www.regexr.com/38m12

show action overflow in system navigation, again

If current activity doesn't use actionbar and the device doesn't have a
hardware menu button, the system must add the action overflow button
beside the system navigation, because otherwise the options become
inaccessible.
I implemented a solution based on this blogpost:
http://android-developers.blogspot.de/2012/01/say-goodbye-to-menu-button.html
[...] if you set minSdkVersion to 10 or lower, set targetSdkVersion to
11, 12, or 13, and you do not use ActionBar, the system will add the
legacy overflow button [...] if the device itself doesn't feature a
hardware menu button, thus making the options accessible.
This solves issue #105 where one could not access the options of
RemoteActivity (and others) on newer devices that don't feature a
hardware menu button (which is basically all devices except Samsung's)

Merge pull request #106 from melo0187/fix-missing-legacy-action-overflow-button
